title: X Factor's Nicole awkwardly sports same dress as Jenny - then sends her through
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

X Factor: Celebrity judge Nicole Scherzinger and contestant Jenny Ryan from The Chase encountered an awkward fashion faux pas in tonight's show.

In the first live show of the series, both Nicole and Jenny ended up wearing the exact same dress.

They both donned a silver sparkling maxi dress with long fringing on the sleeves, and even both paired it with slicked down hairstyles.

And perhaps Nicole felt that imitation was the highest form of flattery, as she raved about Jenny's performance of Rise Like a Phoenix by Conchita Wurst.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

She then put Jenny through to one of her three chairs, meaning Jenny's place in next week's show is confirmed.

This was a surprise result considering Jenny was actually eliminated last week, but was brought back as a wild card act.

This followed a campaign to get her back on as fans were devastated at her elimination following some harsh words from Nicole.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

They even created a hashtag #JusticeForJenny as they demanded The Vixen was given another chance.

Viewers were delighted that Jenny made the cut this week.

One tweeted: "Nicole Scherzinger should be ashamed not putting Jenny Ryan into the lives after that performance!"

(Image: ITV)

Another noted: "Nicole last week on Jenny “you’re not good enough” **Public outcry on twitter** Nicole this week “Amazing! You’re safe and through to next week!!”

"WHAT AN ABSOLUTELY INCREDIBLE AND AMAZING PERFORMANCE BY @jenlion !!!", added another.

"Jenny Ryan out there effortlessly slaying on #XFactorCelebrity . What a come back", added a fourth.
description: Jenny Ryan wore the same dress as Nicole Scherzinger on X Factor: Celebrity tonight - and it seemed to go down well with Nicole
